TEXT.Text: Pirates that are stationed around the Port of the Winds. The port is totally isolated because of {C=0xFFFF0011/}Captain Hookah{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} and his monster troops.

There once was a brave captain of the knights who fought against dragons a few thousand years ago. The Knight Captain oneday turned into an evil spirit and started to attack people. People call the evil spirit the {C=0xFFFF0011/}Artis{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}.

There once was a brave captain of the knights who fought against dragons a few thousand years ago. The Knight Captain oneday turned into an evil spirit and started to attack people. People call the evil spirit the {C=0xFFFF0011/}Lord of Night{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}
There have been more frequent assaults made by wolves. Meanwhile, Chief's daughter, Lylia got kidnapped by a wolf named {C=0xFFFF0011/}Vegabond{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}.

Guards patrolling the neiborhood was ambushed by bandits. Bandits has been in a friendly relationship with humans. What got into them? Defeating the bandit boss {C=0xFFFF0011/}Sangka{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} should lead us to more clues.

Evil lumberjack mercilessly cutting down trees who is the main factor destroing the sorrounding ecosystem. More important than anything, villagers have lost their jobs because of this, and it seriously affected the economy of the village.

Agnes was born as pure crystal of the muted island but it became vicious monsters because of evil poachers who stole soul crystals.
The whole land is frozen but these spiritual trees survived. However, the whole forest is also in danger because of poachers. Someone said Avice was summoned to save this Rancorous Forest from them.

You cannot even see an inch in front of you because of continuous blizzard and the road is right next to dangerous cliffs where avalanche happens all the time. Old tale said that the lair of Legendary Kryos, the Ice Dragon is somewhere around this area.

Bear Claw Mine once was prospered and crowded with many tribes but it is silent and hallow places. The mine was named after Alexandre the Avalanche, the famous furious bear who has frigid and sharp claws.

This is the place {C=0xFFFF0011/}Kalygon Fleet{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} where Captain Hookah and Captain Alvida took the treasures for Paris. While carrying treasures, due to unknown energy, they become outrage.

This gorge is located near Kazeura village. Because of beautiful scenery, Taoists were lived in here. There were many kinds of animals lived together in this untamed wildness place, however, due to recent contamination, they become furious. Be careful!

Valley located East side of Masiram mauntain, where Kazeura Village located. Drakan priests often came to his place for training. Since it's closed to Kazeura Village, thick mist covered this valley for a long time.

From Fungoid Village to Village of Ash Mist, there is a large valley which is famous for many Dragon sighting. In year 203, Vartik the third built his own castle and called the valley, Vartika Hill. Vartik the third and his family disappeared due to a merciless Count Van Cliff.
Need to equip novice set items or ragnarok set items.
Blue Gemstone is required to enter.
You must equip Ice Medallion to enter Dungeon

All the items from normal mode are obtainable from the recipe.
Can obtain at a low chance by defeating Bone Dragon.
Can obtain by defeating Black Witch Paris.
Armors such as helms, can be obtained from elite monsters in Van Cliff.
Accessories such as necklaces, can be obtained from elite monsters in Van Cliff.

Count Van Cliff was a noble with a large amount of property and fame that lived a luxurious lifestyle. This all changed one dark night when a mysterious visitor passed by his mansion. Rumor has it that the count was cursed by black magic and was sealed in his mansion to guard something.

Maze that is known as sealed the prison for the Dark Lord, Elga. Many heroes have visited Drakos to finish off Elga's last life, but no one has found him yet. The only hope now is that you ask for the exact place where Elga is sealed from the Gem of Truth, which can answer all the questions in the world.
Van Cliff Fortress is an old castle which has been cursed. You can choose 3 different difficulty levels; Normal/Rare/Hero.
Drakos is a huge maze known as Elga's Cabinet. You can choose 3 different difficulty levels; Normal/Rare/Hero.

The monsters in the Ice Dungeon of Spirits has Ice elements infused into their body. The chilly air in the Ice Dungeon of Spirits will freeze even fire. But passionate adventurers keep coming to obtain Ice Spiritual Drops.

The monsters in Fire Dungeon of Spirits has Fire elements infused into their body. Many adventurers have lost their lives from the Fire Dungeon of Spirits' blaze. But passionate adventurers keep coming to obtain Fire Spiritual Drops.

The monsters in Nature Dungeon of Spirits has Nature elements infused into their body. Monsters in the Nature Dungeon of Spirits lock its intruders inside forever. But passionate adventurers keep coming to obtain Nature Spiritual Drops.

The monsters in Dark Dungeon of Spirits has Dark elements infused into their body. Once you enter the Dark Dungeon of Spirits, you fall into deep dark depression. But passionate adventurers keep coming to obtain Dark Spiritual Drops.

Experience and learn about the game play of Dragon Saga. Meet Pororing who will guide you through the beginning stages of the game. You will first encounter a situation in Odellia where people are under the fear of wolves that have been recently attacking the village.
The construction of the port has been aborted due to the various marine monsters interfering with the building of sea paths between islands.

Jigsaw Pincers Coast has a beautiful view of the sandy beach and port. It was named after the Jigsaw Pincers which used to be easily found around the area. However, Jigsaw Pincers have recently turned into monsters. It is now a quiet beach with people scared away by the monsters.

Decker Shark Piers is a very vivid place with lots of Kalygon Fleet workers. It is where the Trading Port's cargos is stored. The workers have become cranky due to frequent invasion of pirates, but Port of Winds is what it is now due to the trading port.

Trade Port of Steven. The government purchased real estate surrounding the port area to build an independent trade city. Unique and rare stuff are being secretly traded in the city. The city has been suffering from pirates lately.
A port once used to be a prosperous city is now a devastated dock due to the appearance of a giant nautilus.

Kalygon Fleet is said to have been under attack of pirates for an extended period. Despite the long invasion, the trading went on freely because the defense system was very durable. However, it is no longer how it used to be because of the fearful pirates

A temple built for praising the memories of the High Magician Milkyway. The war hero from the Dragon War which took place a thousand years ago, was revived from death with an evil spirit and began to brutally attack people.

Skypie Sanctuary is a temple for Warriors and is located by the shore. Spirits, which have been asleep for a long time, came back to life to increase the effect of dark energy lately and began attacking mankind.

A temple built for praising the memories of the legendary thief, Belkan, who could steal anything that he wanted. Even though he was a thief, he was a real hero who helped out the poor and fought for justice.

Parmir Sanctuary was built for praising memories of the legendary archer. It is located in a high altitude place to commemorate that the legendary archer was born at such place. Every year, the flesh of live goat is offered to the temple.
The vast plains located in from of Odellia is used for agriculture. Large windmills and food storages have been under attack by monsters that have appeared recently.
The vast plains located in from of Odellia is used for agriculture. Large windmills and food storages have been under attack by monsters that have appeared recently.

Advanced Windia Plains is where large farms and food storages are located. However, recent attacks by monsters are putting this peaceful area in a crisis. To make matters worse, the wolves are threatening the farms recently.

Traitor's Ridge is where Sangka's and Kunkah's bandit hideout is located. They have been maintaining good relationship with the town guard captain, but they started to attack travelers passing by the area recently.

There is a small hill, which can be reached while climbing up Traitor's Ridge. The area is full of frightening wild animals where people would not go near. Bodies of dead wild animals have covered the place.

The Wailing Hill is the key battle ground where the severeness of the combat was at its peak. Victims of the countless battles come back to life at night time and make those pass the area suffered from miserable pain by the wail of wrath.

Canyon of Oblivion, also known as the Canyon of Oblivion, is the passage that leads to the Port of the Winds. Rumors has it that the bandits who attack the travelers are under a curse casted by an evil witch.
Small beach located minutes before the entrance of the Port of Winds. It is a beautiful place where the waves and white sand make quite a scenery.

By travelers' testimonies who came back to Odellia because of wolves' attack, it seems like this is the wolves' hiding place. Some also said that there is a wolf who can actually stand on 2 legs, like human.
A traveler who was recently attacked by wolves said that he saw werewolves around here. To use Edeline's Werewolf Cure, you have to get into the den and defeat the werewolf.

Underground dungeon which leads to the laboratory of Dr. Farrell. The underground sewer located at the bottom floor if City Hall is filled with toxic gas that came through the ventilation that connects it with doctor's lab. On upper floors, there are vari

The doctor, who has been focusing on his research with a mind full of vengeance, has become crazy by the evil energy, and finally uses his own body for an experiment. Secure the village by defeating the doctor who has become a monster by the evil energy o

Dangerous Caverns is said to be a mine before, but deep inside the caves, there is still the heat of magma left. It is where the troops who were transporting supplies are kept. The moles have kidnapped them and now their lives are at a jeopardy to become

The deepest place of the cavern where there are crystals of natural glaciers which still have not melted. It is also the place where the most clean water of the continent can be found. The natural water can be obtained at the price of fighting all the mon

An old mining area which had once been very prosperous thanks to the abundant ores buried in it. However, it is no longer a place for humans since the gas that had been surrounding the area has intensified. Moreover, the gas has created monsters that feed off human flesh!

Temple of Water represents Port of Winds. In the old days, the temple flourished. However, it was closed suddenly and secretly. No one heard about the reason and it was slowly forgotten from people since then. Currently Sp

Legendary Specters' Tower is protected by cursed elite monsters' spirits and they are guarding each floor. You have to defeat them to proceed to higher floors and investigate about Belkan's mythological treasure.

Where brave warriors of war rest in peace. Graveyard keeper Larell did a pretty good job in managing this historical place but recently he is scared because of omnious sounds coming from the underground.
It has been quiet for a while after the monsters were defeated, but now more bigger and horrible sounds, sounds of a Dragon comes from the graveyard. Larell is getting more anxious...
Hookah and Alvida have started to attack sacred beings near the shores of Port of the Winds. To protect the sacred beings, drive them away and secure the area.

In the sacred sanctuary where legendary heroes are buried, there are still machine soldiers guarding the temple. Rumors around Hero's Descent has it that the Witch Paris has left for Dangerous Mecca to find those soldiers. Head to the Dangerous Mecca to f
Vegabond and Vegas returned to Windia Plains when they thought the heroes had left the area. Defeat them to secure the peace of Windia Plains once again.
The main hideout of the bandits led by Sangka and Kunkah. It is filled with fearful bandits.
Barlok's Lair is located deep inside the Dangerous Caverns. No one has returned after seeing Barlok.

Typical port city with a temple praising Triton the water element, a city hall governed by the lord, an inn for travelers, an equipment store, a general store, and experts for each job class. However, mysterious screaming can be heard from somewhere around town.

Warriors' district of Odellia where many expert warriors like the guard captain can be seen. The villagers are in trouble because the wolves have been attacking the village lately, but it seems that the biggest problem is the disappearance of Lylia, daughter of chief Don Morgan.

Magicians' district of Odellia where magician experts such as high magician Pablo can be found. The villagers are in trouble because the wolves have been attacking the village lately, but it seems that the biggest problem is the disappearance of Lylia, daughter of chief Don Morgan.
Archers' district of Odellia where archer experts such as Adelio can be found. They put efforts to keep the town secure, but the district is at high alert because of Lylia being kidnapped.

Dark Backalley is the thieves' district of Odellia where thief experts like Jack can be found. There are no civilians roaming around the Backalley but there are only guards patrolling the perimeter. The whole district is working busy to solve the issue of the disappearance of Lylia, the daughter of Don Morgan.

Moonlight Shore Village is located between the shore and the sanctuary area. In order to go to Libra, you must pass through this village. Without any confirmed reasons, there is always a dark atmosphere. There are undead monsters that attack the fellowship.

A town where trading between the Continent of Wind and Continent of Chaos actively takes place. Many merchants come here to take the ship to go to the Continent of Chaos. After the appearance of Paris, it has become a town of night where there is no day light.

Valid Raeth is the home of the red dragon, Magma Drake Lavalon who is a loyal servant of Elga. It used to be a green meadow, but after Lavalon burned everything, it is now left with only magma fields.
The beginning of the magma stream is located in the deepest part of the abyss. The heat from the abyss would melt anything on contact.

Area where the volcano ash and gas distorted the atmosphere. The unstable atmosphere is causing constant lightning and it could explode upon mixing with the gas at any minute. The ash in the air makes it even hard to breathe.

The magma dried and solidified. It has become a swamp of magma. The area was used as a base point caverns of Rokko's troops. The magma and skeletons that are not yet fully solidified may blow up in any minute.

Essence of Dr. Farrell's research. Magma Drake Lavalon is the complete version of his research on dragons. He used the heat from his own magma field as an energy resource for it and created an artificial burning dragon. The magma field, Valid Raeth was named by the monsters who got so surprised and scared by the flame breath of Lavalon.

A dungeon fully equipped with various flame traps and magma hazards which represent the burning magma field. In side the field is located the entrance portal which leads to the lair of Magma Drake Lavalon. Get yourself prepared for the battle against the

Ships are docked here and there, and some ships have become ghost ships due to the complex structure of the swamp. The magma field that created Lavalon has brought heat and gas to the swamp causing every living creature to die. Only those weird creatures that have adapted to the environment have survived.
Dried Woods Swamp is a dangerous place which cannot be reached by a ship due to dried trees, rocks, and oversized vine trees.

The appearance of Queen Vella has destroyed ecosystem of the swamp. The reeds, which has survived in the area with strong propagation power, totally occupied the area. There is a local tribe that utilizes toxic extracted from the reeds that have absorbed

Queen Vella's pet alligators were released to the swamp during the last flood. Vella left those alligators out of laziness. The number of alligators has rapidly increased, and now they have become a huge problem of the area.

There are two ancient giant trees that are said to be the origin of all kinds of trees. Smart Woodie has become the size of an ant by the spell of a mysterious witch and is now occupying the forest. It seems peaceful from the outside, but inside is rather dangerous.
Tree that absorbed an abundance of nutrition from the swamp that has grown excessively. It also has grown giant, toxic thorny vines.

The temperature gap between morning and evening at Misty Lane has been creating fog around the region since very long ago. The consistent foggy climate has caused countless incidents within the area historically.
The forest is rapidly becoming extinct because of the brutal Woodsman Paul Burnaun. The king has organized a special unit to resolve the problem and formed a base camp at Pine Cone Hills.

Due to Burnaun's reckless tree cutting, the forest that had been blocking the wind from the north has been lost. Because of the fierce wind from the north, all villagers have left their homes, and the area belongs to only Burnaun now.

God's Sanctuary is where the ancient gods rest. It's supposed to be a calm and peaceful place, but the recent conflict amongst the Kentarous has made it a chaotic place. The fight is creating anger with the gods.

Collapsed Sanctuary was once a prosperous place, but severe battles have devastated it. Now, the place is left with empty shells of dead Arams. The demolished appearance seems to represent how severe the battles have been.

Remains of Trace is the abandoned village of Kentarous that devastated from countless battles throughout their history. What is seen is all that the villagers have left as the village chief, Karkharous, also has poisoned the well during the battles.
An altar built to commemorate the legendary Kentarous hero. Each year, all Kentarous gather and have a ceremony to praise the anniversary.

Mutisha injected his own soul to another Aram in order to become the master of the dead which it summoned. The Aram that Mutisha chose to inject his soul is three times bigger than a man. Mutisha's soul has been injected into Aram, and Mutisha's body has been abandoned.

Mist Elves appeared in the human world again when they found out that Aram, which was created by their ancestors, was being controlled by an evil spirit. They are aware that it is yet too dangerous for them to reveal themselves again, but they are willing to finish their job. However, they capability is limited in the human world.
A Legendary Forest where Mist Elves are believed to be living. Many Forest Spirits and forest guardian "Ryvius" is believed to be living.

Fungoid tribe's small village. Fungoid village is well-known for a wide variety of items that are not available in other parts of the continent. However, some say that the Fungoid tribe has somewhat harsh feelings against humans.
Traces of the Fungoid tribe can be found here. It is no longer a prosperous area in any way, and only corrupt fairies and monsters remain.

This place used to be a beautiful forest when the Fungoid tribe began settling into Fungoid Village. Tutu flower trees were contaminated one day and have begun to emit poisonous gas. As a result, local creatures could not pass through the forest and contaminated forest fairies have resided in the area.
Fungoid tribe's quiet park. It is now an abandoned park since all local residents left due to the contamination. Only the contaminated fairies still wander around.

Village where people from the Forgotten Village and Fungoid Village used to live together, but has been devastated due to monsters attacks. It is now occupied by monkeys that enjoy silence, so it seems like the whole village is asleep.

Used to be a mushroom processing factory, but now only ruins remain after the contaminated fairies destroyed it. The Fungoid Mushroom, which used to be known for its excellent recovery capability, is now even categorized as a poisonous mushroom due to the contamination.

A place where everything is frozen. It is known as the Land of Temptation where the soul of a witch lies within. The local legend says that there once was an Ice Golem living here which froze everything with a single touch.

A ridge located between Land of Temptation and Frigid Canyon where blizzard constantly stays. Over the hill is the Frost Lake. Rumor has it that one may come across the legendary Frost Dear Fairy here.

Frost Lake, which is known as the ice fairies' resting place, has an abundance of clean natural ice. Due to the fact that the ice here restores one's mana, many magicians try to visit the place, but many of them die from the freezing climate.
Castle of the Ice Queen who is said to have a heart of ice is located here. Rumor has it that the reason why the ice fairies have been attacking travelers lately is because the Ice Queen is angry.

Only ice fairies are known to be able to reside here due to the fierce blizzard. Legend has it that there is a secret passage which leads to the castle of the Ice Queen. Many heroes have left for the passage, but none have returned yet.
Entrance to Drakos where Elga has been sealed and imprisoned. Elga's vile voice seems to be echoing nearby. The structure is a complex labyrinth to hide the place where Elga is sealed.

Machina Center is located at the heart of Drakos which it maintains the seal mechanism put on Elga. It seems there are mechanical devices consisting in this place, but it is actually powered by the life energy of numerous magicians.
The top floor of Drakos is beautifully illuminated by the moonlight coming into the terrace. Along with the beautiful moonlight, the best of Paris' follower, Antares is guarding the final gateway.

Higher floors of Drakos. Ordinary creatures cannot stay here due to the severe environment. Out of the complex labyrinth at the top floor is a secret tower which reveals only the truth to the ones who seek it.

This luxurious mansion was once a property of a noble who used to possess great power and wealth as a close follower of the King few hundreds years ago. Even til 50 years ago, many visitors have come to the mansion every night. However, strange rumors began spreading about the mansion. Now, it is abandoned and no one wants to go there.

Used to be a residence area in front of the Van Cliff Fortress. It is now a haunted village with the scary ghosts visiting the village every night. Now, all local residents are left and only travelers and merchants visit the village.
Queen Vella's main habitat where fireflies live.
Back side of Forgotten Village where the forest is ruled by the elves of forest.
Lake of ice fairies is known to be Ice Queen's garden.
Rumor has it that there is a secret passage that leads to the underground level of Drakos.

Located beyond Frigid Canyon is the final defense line base camp for attacking Drakos. A number of troops for attacking Drakos are gathered here. The camp is used for the final check up before attacking Paris at Drakos.
This is the first place after Ellora camp. The whole area is frozen and barren. No one would be here, however, detective Gordon found some creatures in this place while investigating.

Detective Gordon insists he saw the last trace of some creature at this place. It's not certain that if there is a creature, but there's no way any creature could survive after being surrounded by powerful monsters.
FrostSoul Avice lives in this place. Snow Fox tribe Captain,Blair, asked for a collection of Avice Spirits, but gave no clue where or how to obtain it.

The creature Gordon found was Snow Fox tribe. As Colin advised, the Dragon Fellowship should help the Snow Fox tribe to gain their trust. If you're lucky, the Snow Fox tribe would offer the people great help back.

Dragon Fellowship encountered Mist Elf tribe in Marshmallow Valley. Hel Krouzer, Mist Elf tribe Captain, said they followed certain atmosphere. He described the atmosphere as soul's energy, which is colder than Death.
As Blair requested, a collection of Avice Spirits. According to what Blair said, Kryos could be controlled by the collected spirit. What is Blair planning to do with Ice Dragon?

Big bear Alexandre lives in this place. It is the same as Avice's case, the Dragon Fellowship should obtain a Collection of Alexandre Spirits, which the Snow Fox tribe captain asked. Blair's real plan is still vague.

Ice Rock Hill is last place to stay in this continent. Because of what Snow Fox tribe Captain, Blair said. Colin gave the order to the whole continent to find Blair. The Dragon Fellowship is trying to help, but the information about Ice Rock Hill is scarce.

Dragon Tribe, Dragonkin's Hometown. This place has been isolated from the outside by the magic square called Huge bird Kazeura's Nest for a long time. Currenlty, it appeared out of the dense fog because of the Dark Witch's plot to steal the Precious treasure.

One of the hills between Fungoid Village and Village of Ash Mist. It has been known as a sacred place to see dragons for a long time. Vartika Hill is named after Vartike, the third duke. Vartike the third duke was ruined by Count Van Cliff.

It's named as Vanshi Gorge because of the rumor that Ghosts come out when it's misty. Since the rumor has continued to spead, the people built a small church. However, even the church cannot be seen currently.

This gorge is located near Kazeura village. Because of the beautiful scenery, Taoists were lived there. There were many kinds of animals that lived together in this untamed wilderness place, however, due to recent contamination, they have become furious. Be careful!

Valley located East side of Masiram mountain, where Kazeura Village is located. Dragonkin priests often come to this place for training. Since it's close to Kazeura Village, thick mist covers this valley for a long time.
In this corner between continents, there is a sealed Dragonkin village for human beings which is Kazeura. This area was unreachable for human but with the continent shift, it has been revealed.
Like an elephant death ritual, Dragons also have a special secret graveyard for their death. When the time comes, Dragon Velly is a peaceful place for their solitary death.
Once you depart Ellora camp, you will meet Nail Hill which is connected with Edge of the world.
This gorge is called Wing Gorge due to its look. Recently this place is forbidden as evil spirits were found.
Due to the number of knights that were exterminated in one day by Elga, this place became a wasteland.

Akia cave is the holy place which God Eir created the first Dragonkin with its gene and a dragon’s egg. There were 7 creatures initially however, they disobeyed God Eir and were sealed in God Eir’s precious treasures.

One of the precious treasures is in this altar. There is an Archpriest of Shadow Rue that is its guardian. Few Dragonkin priests head to the cave as they found that it leads to their precious treasure.
An ancient kingdom’s knights were dispatched to find God’s precious treasures. But this resulted in the awakening of the sealed dragon in Black Claw Nest, Dark Dragon Lord Elga.
This place is where Dark Dragon Lord Elga was sealed, far back in the past. After Paris was defeated by the Heroes, Elga chose this place to maximize his power.

{C=0xFFFF5917/}[Chocolate Meister's house]{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} It is known as taste of chocolate depends on the {C=0xFF00FFFF/}Chocolate Meister{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}'s mood and {C=0xFF00FFFF/}Chocolate Meister{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} was suffering from {C=0xFFFF0000/}Team Anti-Love{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}. Let's relax {C=0xFF00FFFF/}Chocolate Meister{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} to defeat {C=0xFFFF0000/}Team Anti-Love{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}.

{C=0xFFFF5917/}[Chocolate Storage]{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} This place is known for the biggest chocolate storage. Many chocolates head here from all the villages. But, the amount of chocolates coming in has been lowered. This is the main reason for Yamaki’s depression. Let’s help keep safe the {C=0xFF00FFFF/}Chocolate Boxes{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} from the mysterious {C=0xFFFF0000/}Chocolate Robbers{C=0xFFFFFFFF/}.
아키아 동굴은 오염된 신보 아카나이가 잠들어 있다. 아카나이의 영향으로 신보를 지키던 정령들도 오염되어 버렸다. 신보를 정화하기 위해 아키아 동굴로 들어간 용족의 전사들은 오염된 정령들에게 당하고 만다. 이에 카즈라 마을의 신관은 아키아 동굴을 봉인한다. 하지만 언젠가 영웅이 찾아와 신보를 정화해 줄 것이라는 예언이 카즈라 마을에 떠돌고 있다.
천상인의 세계로 가는 문이라고 알려진 붉은여우 삼각지. 그 문의 최정상에는 세티로스라는 문지기가 길을 막고 있다고 알려졌다. 모험가들은 세티로스의 무서움보다 천상인의 보물을 얻기 위해 도전했지만, 부스터 백팩이라는 특수한 장비를 찾지 못해 발걸음을 돌려야 했다. 하지만 천상인의 보물에 대한 전설은 수많은 이들이 부스터 백팩을 찾게 만들고 있다.

Orc Field was just normal place that Orc Hero ruled. However, after the appearance of the mysterious energy, monsters started to change and the dimensional rift was found around Orc Field. And people cannot cross the field anymore. Even the tradition of passing down armors for generations of heroes have disappeared. Many heroes from Ragnarok world has attempted to purify Orc Field, but they could not overcome the massive power of these monsters.

Dungeon basement in Glast Heim is being dominated by Dark Lord. Monsters around Dark Lord have mutated and Glast Heim became an inhabitable area. Also it is protected by the Dimensional Seal, which was created by Doctor Kaluza. To neutralize the Dimension Seal, Avatar set from Orc Field must be equipped.

It's known that Ice Palace can be found only during Winter. {C=0xFFFF0011/}Queen of Snow Batore{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} and her sister {C=0xFFFF0011/}Countess Mary{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} have been bound inside for centuries . The gatekeeper {C=0xFFFF0011/} BearDolly{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} keeps the Ice Palace from being exposed to the outside world.

Secret forest that is shown only on Halloween. There is an old mansion where {C=0xFFFF0011/}greedy Jack{C=0xFFFFFFFF/} is living in the forest that is filled with fog and smell of candies. But you can only enter by doing some deals with Randy. Moreover, there is only a few people going it because it's full of freaky ghost and monsters protecting the forest.
